text: The New Zealand cricket team and the Sri Lanka cricket team toured the United States in May. This was the first time Full Members of the International Cricket Council met in an official match in the United States. All matches were played at Central Broward Regional Park in Lauderhill, Florida. The tournament was scheduled to be of 3 Twenty20 Internationals between the teams but due to substandard lights in the stadium, the 1st match scheduled to be held on 20 May was cancelled as it was a Night game. ==Background== Both teams came straight from the 2010 ICC World Twenty20 in the West Indies to Florida. ==Squads== {| |- valign="top" | {| class="toccolours" style="text-align: left;" |- ! colspan="3" align="center" | |- | style="font-size: 95%;" valign="top" | Batsmen All-rounders | style="font-size: 95%;" valign="top" | Wicket-keepers Bowlers |} || {| class="toccolours" style="text-align: left;" |- ! colspan="3" align="center" | |- | style="font-size: 95%;" valign="top" | Batsmen * Tillakaratne Dilshan * Mahela Jayawardene * Dinesh Chandimal * Chamara Kapugedera * Chinthaka Jayasinghe All-rounders * Angelo Mathews * Sanath Jayasuriya | style="font-size: 95%;" valign="top" | Wicket-keepers * Kumar Sangakkara (c) Bowlers * Muttiah Muralitharan * Thisara Perera * Nuwan Kulasekara * Ajantha Mendis * Lasith Malinga * Chanaka Welagedara * Suraj Randiv |} |} ==Twenty20 Series== ===1st T20I=== ===2nd T20I=== ==Coverage== *Sky Sport – New Zealand *Star Cricket – India *ESPN – United Kingdom *Supersport 2 – South Africa *Caribbean Media Corporation – West Indies *Star Cricket – Singapore *Fox Sports – Australia *Geo Super – Pakistan *ESPN3 – USA ==See also== * United States v Canada (1844) ==References== ==External links== * Tournament Page Category:International cricket competitions in 2010 Category:United States cricket in the 21st century Category:United States in international cricket New Zealand 2010 Sri Lanka 2010 Category:2010 in American sports Category:2009–10 New Zealand cricket season Category:2010 in Sri Lankan cricket Category:2010 in sports in Florida Category:Cricket in Florida
title: New Zealand cricket team against Sri Lanka in USA in 2010
